meanings.definition: Not broiled or cooked over direct heat.
meanings.sent1: The unbroiled vegetables were fresh and crunchy.
meanings.sent2: I prefer my steak unbroiled, just seared on the outside.
meanings.sent3: The unbroiled chicken decided to take a dip in the hot tub instead.
meanings.sent4: Her unbroiled anger simmered beneath the surface, waiting to boil over.
meanings.sent5: The unbroiled fish glistened in the sunlight, tempting the hungry cat.

meanings.definition: Not involved in a heated argument or conflict.
meanings.sent1: She remained unbroiled during the intense debate.
meanings.sent2: The unbroiled student stayed calm and composed during the disagreement.
meanings.sent3: The unbroiled siblings settled their differences with a game of chess.
meanings.sent4: His unbroiled demeanor was a soothing presence in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The unbroiled atmosphere in the room diffused the tension between the coworkers.
